subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: This project is aimed to support the Government of Turkmenistan in the development and implementation of new accounting system through modification of the regulatory and legislative frameworks to support its successful functioning, and by providing training to strengthen accounting capacities based on international best practices. The project would also aim to strengthen capacities of the government in the field of audit and financial control.
subproject.title: Accounting Systems
